SELECT concat('JOIN_CACHE:commodity_brand_', ${innerOrgId}, '_', id) AS cache_key, id, brand_name, brand_name_en, customer_id FROM commodity_brand WHERE
id = #{keys}
id BETWEEN #{minKey} AND #{maxKey} AND id in(#{keys})
1 = 2

SELECT concat('JOIN_CACHE:commodity_', ${innerOrgId}, '_', c.id) AS cache_key, c.id, c.customer_id, c.sku, c.commodity_name, c.commodity_name_en, c.spec_name, c.spec_name_en, c.color_name, c.color_name_en, cb.brand_name, cb.brand_name_en, c.img_url, c.is_correspondence, c.hs_code FROM commodity c LEFT JOIN commodity_brand cb ON c.brand_id = cb.id WHERE
c.id = #{ids}
c.id BETWEEN #{minKey} AND #{maxKey} AND c.id in(#{ids})
1 = 2
